It checks whether any error occurred and sets job status based on some known parameters. It considers the following things into account: * Any OS command failed or not. (E.g. $? OS variable) * Job explicitly sets error code into known variable. * AE Script processing error. (E.g. Validation errors) It considers any non-zero value as error scenario. Further based on job status, it logs the success or failure message into Job report.
This include can be only used in Job's Process tab. It can be used for Windows PowerShell environment.
